37.eng-name: Trials and Fierce Battles (Kitab Al-Fitan Wa Al-Malahim)

hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Miqdad ibn al-Aswad: I swear by Allah, I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: The happy man is he who avoids dissensions: happy is the man who avoids dissensions; happy is the man who avoids dissensions: but how fine is the man who is afflicted and shows endurance

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي النَّهْىِ عَنِ السَّعْىِ، فِي الْفِتْنَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Participating In The Tribulation
